duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new business development opportunities for service offerings.
Maintain client relationships and grow the existing book of business.
Identify and initiate contact with decision-makers and secure initial client visits.
Convert prospects into new clients and grow additional business with existing clients.
Champion exceptional customer service and provide business solutions to meet client base needs.
Travel within prescribed territory and represent the company at networking events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business management, administration, or related field and a minimum of 5 years professional solutions-based outside sales experience.
